title: Mobile AR-Based Malay Language Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Malay vocabulary and grammar comprehension
context.additional_context: Immersive language learning environment using AR technology, with curriculum design emphasizing collective nouns and idiom acquisition

learning_goals: Using AR applications, learners can accurately identify and use 20 Malay collective nouns in real-life contexts
Learners can understand 15 Malay proverbs within their cultural contexts and apply them appropriately in situations
Through AR-based interactive activities, learners can apply Malay grammatical structures with at least 85% accuracy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
